title: Goblet
description: Venetian or facon-de-Venise latticinio goblet; thick stem with delicate lattice-like engraving; bulbous midsection on stem; cylindrical shape at top with lip around bottom edge of vessel with vertical applied linear elements--alternating hash marks and white stripes; two horizontal bands on bottom half of vessel; clear glass
creditline: Gift of Chichi Steiner and Tom Rassieur in memory of Mary Orear Terry
